thread.title: Watford striker Odion Ighalo boards team bus for the trip to Bournemouth despite WBA circling with a £20m offer for the Nigerian
thread.title_full: Watford striker Odion Ighalo boards team bus for the trip to Bournemouth despite WBA circling with a £20m offer for the Nigerian

author: ituckey
title: Watford striker Odion Ighalo boards team bus for the trip to Bournemouth despite WBA circling with a £20m offer for the Nigerian
text:
EFL ODION DRAMA Watford striker Odion Ighalo boards team bus for the trip to Bournemouth despite WBA circling with a £20m offer for the Nigerian 
Hornets boss Walter Mazzarri cools talk of a quick sale for the 27-year-old but admits the club's transfers are out of his hand By VIKKI ORVICE
